Esse jogo pra mim é diferente, todos estão enchendo o saco e fazendo Review bomb.

Seguinte, tenho umas 2.000 horas nesse jogo e já peguei GM1, depois que eu peguei o rank máximo eu não tive mais vontade de jogar ranked, porque não fazia mais sentido pra mim, mas o problema do jogo não é ele em si, O JOGO É MUITO BOM!! O problema é a Blizzard.

Eles sabem lançar personagens, mas o resto, cheio de micro-transações com o preço muito acima, e o principal... o sistema de ranked ta muito ruim, mas muito mesmo. Porém é um dos únicos jogos que ainda conseguem me divertir, eu amo esse jogo do fundo do coração e ele em si não é ruim, o problema é a produtora!

ESPERO MUITO QUE O JOGO MELHORE AOS POUCOS E VOLTE A SER BOM PRA TODOS!

cat

Once upon a time, I had a cat, I had ten dollars, I would buy it food for eight dollars, bathe it often, and it was very sticky to me.

Later, I took it out to play, passers-by thought it was cute, they fed it cat food, ham sausage, I was very unhappy because it was mine. I wanted to carry it home, but he broke away from me and meowed at the person who gave it good food, I hugged him a few times and he didn't go with me, and scratched me, so I turned around and left.....

Later, I came across it by chance on the road, and it was dirty. Passers-by will only give it good food and play with it, but they will not take it home and bathe it. It saw me and followed me home, I shut it out, it meowed outside the door, it was very uncomfortable,
[h1]but I wouldn't want it anymore[/h1]

如何在不下载游戏的情况下愉快的打差评
评测条件：通过挂时长软件添加游戏累计6分钟即可

PC端：
watt toolkit（原steam++）
ASF
SAM

移动端：
云挂卡APP
如何从库中移除游戏
主页 > 帐户 > 许可和产品序列号激活：点击移除即可
或者
客服 >> 我想从帐户中移除这款游戏

彼阳的晚意,初升的东曦;美目的顾耳，似暮的篝壁。温柔是你宛如少女的梦，但我扯碎的梦，你梦的翅膀，并阐述你的梦;我骑上尤热烈的马，来摩洛哥城堡。似玛瑙潭，柠檬酸了，暖梦熟了;柠檬睡了，暖梦死了。未成熟难梦到愁般，笙变，失败，伤悲......丝般暖梦似乐，溺梦愁编。

The only good side is it's free to play. It's just a lick of paint over overwatch 1 (which means it has a decent gameplay, at least), with no real addition, and no paid content worth to be paid at all. If you search on google "how to squander a IP and a developer's reputation" you'll find a picture of the suits that decided this was a good idea.
